column4: Anyone here know howto force a resolution on a external screen from a laptop?
what video card do you have
under "preferences" do you have "NVIDIA X SERVER SETTINGS"?
do you choose configure and choose something other than cloning your display? it should let you change to its own X
whitch is returning a invalid edid
i'm not sure what that is
you can't choose "advanced" and force the resolution? I can edit manually my laptop resolution
(not hooked up to an external atm, so i can't test that)
you can change your panning not your resolution
my fault I just glanced over the setting
only other idea I have is try different drivers...i've gotta go though at work
